features: Package Includes: boho lamp for bedroom is made from quality iron base and linen fabric lampshade, ensuring longevity and reliability, can be applied as bedside lamp, office lamp or living room lamp; The round base is designed so that the lamp will not tip over and avoid scratching the tabletop

Boho and Modern Design: the nursery lamp boasts a modern and boho design concept that can suit any room style or theme; This unique lamp not only illuminates the room but could also double as a decorative piece for bedroom, living room, baby room, cafe, bookcase

Practical Gift Choice: forest animal lamp makes for a thoughtful and useful gift; Be it birthdays, Christmas, Thanksgiving, housewarming, or just a delightful surprise for your little ones, partners, families, this nightstand lamp makes for a nice addition to their space

Warm and Comfortable Lighting: woodland lamp provides a warm color light that creates a cozy and comforting atmosphere in room; Linen fabric lampshade softens brightness, so that the warm light is soothing to the eyes, providing nice illumination for bedtime reading or peaceful sleep, while also adding to the room's overall atmosphere; The glow is bright enough for visibility yet dim enough to not be dazzling, making it the nice lighting solution for night

Ideally Sized for Kids' Bedside: size can often be a challenge when it comes to choosing kids' room decor; With dimensions of 10.2 x 5.1 x 5.1 inches, our kids bedroom lamp fits comfortably on any bedside table, desk, or shelf without consuming much space; This ideal size, combined with its appealing design, makes it an ideal addition to room furnishings
body.description: Features: This boho bedside lamp is very suitable for birthdays, Christmas, or as a surprise gift. The forest animal print, warm light, and sleek design appeal to both kids and adults. This enchanting warm light of kids lamp creates a cozier atmosphere, which can help relax you before sleep. It's bright enough to be practical, but gentle enough that it won't dazzle or disturb your eyes. Specifications: Material: iron base and linen fabric lampshadeLight color: warm colorSize: about 10.2 x 5.1 x 5.1 inches/ 26 x 13 x 13 cmPackage includes: 1 x Bedside table lampNotes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The color may exist a slight difference due to different screen displays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a fun little light. It's brighter than I anticipated...and thats a good thing. It looks really nice in my kiddos room. Might get another one to match it on both nightstands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars small, cute, and well made for being cheap materials
reviews.reviewText: I just got this and put it together. Then I put it in the middle guest bedroom which is decorated for a female.It's small and cute and well made even though it's all cheap materials.I just wish it had USB ports built into it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Keep size in mind.
reviews.reviewText: Product works just smaller than expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute little lamp
reviews.reviewText: This is a cute little lamp. I just thought it's gonna be a little taller, but overall satusfied with it. The design is pretty, perfect addition to the nursery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reminds Us of Times Past
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Muted colored, this boho child's lamp is so cute, it looks like a lamp from yesteryear. I appreciate the fact that the lamp shade was put together. So many of the inexpensive table lamps require that you put it together by rolling the lampshade material onto the frame of the lampshade. Also, there is no adjustment of a harp to deal with. Just set the lampshade onto the bulb area. How easy can it get!In the description it states that the linen fabric softens the brightness of the light to create a soft warm lighting affect. I mention this because this is exactly what I was seeking! Just enough light that it wouldn't keep the baby from falling asleep. The lamp looks at its best at night when switched on. Discussing switches, this has a most convenient switch, for on and off, that is located on the actual electrical cord. I like that!The hot ballon theme on the lampshade is what is most notable about this little lamp. Living in the southwest, in the summertime, as a young adult, I was fortunate to see a great variety of hot ballons pass close to my neighborhood. It was such a beautiful captivating sight! So, with that said, I will enjoy these tiny hot ballons for as long as this lamp last!
